name: 6 Comfortable  room with a garden
space: A community of nice people who live a good life quality is also close to Tel Aviv within a half hour drive
summary: a quiet place 400 meters above the sea level and 5 minites from Kfar Saba

name: Private room in a Peaceful Oasis
space: Free coffee and tea, and if we have some cookies we would love to share them with you.
summary: My place is a quiet 4-bedroom house overlooking the Judean Desert and the Jordan Hills. It is a great spot for any guest travelling from Jerusalem to the North, South or the Dead Sea.  We have a cozy patio for relaxing or watching the sunrise. We also have some great restaurants nearby and a number of unique activities in the area (hikes, camels, ATVs, etc.)!  Make sure you make plans in advance so that I can help you with bus schedules.
transit: Our bus, the 215 from Binyanei Hauma (across the road from the Central Bus Station), is only every hour or two so please ask for specific schedules.

name: Berman family
summary: A beautiful Villa, located perfectly between Jerusalem and the Dead Sea. 20 Min from Jerusalem. The House located in a quiet Village, children's frienldy. just 20 m from the Villa there is abeautiful play ground, in 3 min walk there is a Horse Farm, where you can enjoy rides. The house has a small but fun pool, and a  tennis table for use . In the house you will find a huge rooms, comfertable bathrooms and kitchen full equipped.

name: Cozy 2 room apartment in Alon Shvut
summary: Great little apartment in Alon Shvut, Close to Jerusalem, Right next to the famous Yeshivat Har Etzion. Perfect for a couple looking for a nice cozy place.

name: Alon Shvut Zimmer
summary: In a lush garden among fruit trees and flowers, In a  Relaxing atmosphere,  we offer comfortable bedrooms, living room with Wireless internet, TV, VCR and movies, Fully equipped kitchen. Panoramic view of Gush Etzion, airy, bright, homey. Centrally located in Alon Shvut, Gush Etzion, close to buses, shopping center, parks, Har Etzion Yeshiva, shuls, great views, and restaurants and dining.  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

name: Gush Etzion summer sublet
space: perfect for couple with two kids
summary: This apartment has its own back entrance. 4 adult beds available, kosher kitchen, storage closet, big beautiful backyard with trampoline, lots of toys. available July 19th-Aug 20. right near supermarkets, restaurants, parks, shuls, and 30 min drive from center of Jerusalem. all utilities are available for use.
transit: you need a car to get around

name: Rustic  caravan in Gush etzion
summary: Rustic caravan in the middle of the vineyards with stunning views! Around there is many springs, Hiking, Extreme Park, and boutique restaurants.  A 20-minute drive from Jerusalem. There is a bus every hour to Jerusalem.

name: Big house in the center of Ariel
summary: 140 meters house, 5 rooms, 2 shawers in the center of ariel, close to shops and green park

name: Double bedroom 2 in a welcoming flat
space: Spacious cottage. We live and work upstairs.  Look at the pictures + there is us, specially friendly and welcoming.
summary: A room in a spacious modern flat in the center of Ariel.  (The room size is 3.0m X 3.8m) 2 min walk from local shops and money change.  Free unlimited Sim card and unlimited Internet usage with a Local Number for anyone booking a week or more. (Inc free calls abroad to land line numbers to most countries and to mobiles in the US )  1 hr away by bus from Jerusalem, Tel Aviv and the beach. (35 min by car)  I am a film maker and working from home, so am there most of the time to help.
transit: 1 hr away by bus from Tel Aviv and the beach. Bus every 15 to 20 min. 30 min by car to the Beach and 40 min to Tel Aviv.  The main Toll Rd no 6,  15 min away.

name: Beautiful home on the dead sea!
space: This  second floor apartment is brand new and spotlessly clean, with two bedrooms, a living room, dining area, kitchenette, and elegant pampering bathroom. One bedroom has a queen size bed and the second has 2 single beds and a few mattresses. The apartment has a  living room, dining area and full kitchen with a refrigerator, toster oven, cooktop and coffee/tea kettle .living room opens to a huge roof terrace overlooking the Dead Sea to the East and the magnificent Judean desert peaks to the West.
summary: Ovnat is a small village by the dead sea. It is a 5 minute drive from the  dead sea shore and 15 minutes from beautiful streams and fascinating trails of Nachal David, Nachal Arugot, Ein Feshkha and Ein Gedi. It is the perfect base for exciting and educational outings in the area, including the first- century Essene village of Qumran and the Herodian fortress on the heights of masada. This apartment is brand new and spotlessly clean.
transit: The best way to get around here is a car. You can also use the bus, or a private taxi.

name: Cozy Studio - Dead sea - LOWEST AIRBNBN ON EARTH
space: My studio for dance and movement becomes the perfect place for your vacation!  In the heart of a new and vibrant neighborhood in Ovnat, we invite you to experience a combination of desert, quiet, welcoming people and a comfortable and pleasant stay. Here you can enjoy a large spacious space, super clean, shower, kitchenette, linen and towels and a tourist consultant who will gladly answer any question (this is my husband :-)
summary: In the heart of the Judean Desert, opposite the special Dead Sea, a charming and well equipped studio. Welcome to an unforgettable experience: quiet, close tourist and recreation sites. Ten minutes from the public beach and just half an hour from Masada and Jerusalem.  At -345  meters under sea level that is the lowest Airbnb home in the universe!!!  And, if you are adventurous and are looking for a different experience on the Dead Sea, away from the tourist stops ask us about the secret hike -)
transit: Getting around is made easy by car or by public transportation since the village is close to a main road (90). You should note that without a car it might be a little difficult since there is no restaurant or grocery store here. The closest store is about 7-minute drive, in Kalia.

name: Comfortable family unit at the Dead Sea
space: Our family unit is 25 square meters, with two large comfortable beds, and a loft with 4 mattresses for the chidren to sleep.  There is a bathroom and a shower, small kichen available for cooking, with a small refrigerator with a carton of milk.  The unit has a separate entrance, and it's location creats for a family a distinct sense of privacy, with an outside sitting area overlooking the stunning vastness if the Dead Sea. We are located in a very friendly, small community village.
summary: Vacation at the Dead Sea and stay in our private, brand new, comfortable family unit that allows you to experience an exciting closeness to the unique beauty of the Dead Sea. We are located only 10  minutes from kalia beach, 40 minutes from Masada ( to the south) and Jerusalem (to the north).
transit: For getting to us you can drive your car or come with an Egged bus to Ovnat- number: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) from Jerusalem.

name: A window to the dead sea
space: Our nice  designed home includes: private parking, a big kitchen and a nice open space in the living room. 4 large badrooms, 3 toilets and a bath. There is a large yard outside with an outdoor eating space in a patio facing the dead sea.
summary: Our house in the  judean desert nearby the dead sea is  great for families and couples who want to spend a nice and quite weekend or  holiday. Our inviting house is waiting for you..
transit: We live in a Quiet Village, only a short driving distance from national nature reserves like   Enot Tsukim and En Gedi, and a 40 min. drive from Messada and Jerusalem.

name: Emanuel's Residence (: by the Dead Sea
space: We also have a gallery where kids love to sleep, see pictures. It holds 5 mattresses.
summary: A beautiful and intimate country house, looking over the Dead Sea and in walking distance from it (in the winter). Half an hour drive from Jerusalem, Matzada, Qumran, and close to many natural sweet water sources. Ideal for families- quiet, safe (children can play outside unwatched). The house is Kosher so is appropriate for Religious Jews or Vegans.
transit: A car is very helpful in the area.

name: Charming double room in Dead Sea
space: This bright, sunny, super clean one bedroom unit is Newly renovated, it features a fully equipped kitchenette (refrigerator and stove top) Plasma 3D TV, working desk, AC, computer and free WIFI. The Unit has a separate entrance, and has complete privacy. It is connected to the main house where my family lives. Double bed in bedroom, and onther double bed in living room. Pack n Play available too. Fresh linens and towels are provided, sleeps up to 5. Bathroom has brand new Rain head.  We are located in Ovnat a Beautiful village.  Located only half an hour from Ein Gedi and Masada and 40 Minute drive to Jerusalem.
summary: Come and experience the Dead sea and Judean desert  in this amazing 2 room 1 Bathroom brand new apartment. Only five minutes away from the near beach, and half an hour away from Ein Gedi and Mesada.  Beautiful Ocean view from Main Living room.
transit: The best way to get there is in the car, but there is a bus from Jerusalem or from Ein Gedi. The Dead Sea is better in the car, but Masada has a bus

name: Dead Sea view villa
space: הישוב שלנו דתי. והמטבח כשר. קחו בחשבון שבשבת יש כאן אווירת שבת ובמרחב הציבורי לא מדליקים אש ולא מוזיקה. בתוך הבית תנהגו איך שמתאים לכם. לגבי אוטו, אפשר להכנס ולצאת.
summary: Come stay at the lowest Villa on earth!  Enjoy the peaceful atmosphere at home, and the beautiful desert around  The Villa  is facing the Dead Sea If you're looking for a calm and quiet vacation, we'll be happy to have you. The Sudri family ברוכים הבאים לביתנו באבנת שבצפון ים המלח. בבית תוכלו למצוא ארבעה חדרי שינה סלון מטבח מרווחים ומרפסת גינה ענקית אל מול הרי מואב וים המלח. משחקים לילדים. הרבה שקט ושלווה. בסביבה הקרובה עין פשחה עין גדי נחל דוד ערוגות, חופים ומסלולי טיול רבים. נשמח בבואכם.

name: Sweet studio in the dead sea
summary: New studio! garden with amaizing dead sea view. In ovnat small and peacfull village. One big room with bad bathroom and kitchen. And nice place out side

name: mobile home,amazing view to dead se
summary: mobile home,amazing view to dead sea, privacy, 200 meter on top of settlement "ovnat", 20 minets walking from dead sea, 5 bed, hot shower, Shade nets.

name: Quartier ultra résidentiel
summary: Appartement dans villa ultra résidentiel piscine jacuzzi

name: Magic BUS HOUSE
space: It is important to note that our lifestyle is Permaculture principles held by.  therefore we use composting toilet and we keep our food leftovers to our garden compost so our geusts are welcome to do so as well while staying at our House. (not must)  Our bus is built out of love and thinking about the environment. So we tried to recycle and use what we already have.  Of course it's present in the particular house design and the atmosphere. we hope anly in a good way :)
summary: Our place is close to Jerusalem- 20 min, 45 min from Tel Aviv, 1 hour from the Dead Sea.      Great views, restaurants and dining, parks, art and culture, natural springs, forest, mauntain and near the desert.. You’ll love my place because of  The beutiful open views of Israel. very good vibes. Nice design of the House, very cozy and of course its well equipped!. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.

name: Little house in Bat Ayin
summary: Little house in beautiful Bat Ayin suitable for a couple for a relaxing vacation on weekends. Luxurious house fully equipt for shabbat (takeaway shabbat food 5 minute drive away), stunning view with fresh air sorounded with fruit trees and nature.  Bat Ayin is an othentic and relaxing vilage blessed with natural springs (walking distance) and amazing view!

name: Beautiful House With Splendid View in Gush Estion
summary: The perfect place for a quiet and relaxing time-off in Gush Etsion. Well designed and brand new house with spectacular view, spacious garden close to family-friendly activities, great views, and art and culture. My place is good for couples, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets).

name: בקתת עץ כפרית הררית קסומה.
space: הישוב 'בת עין' השוכן בגוש עציון, נבנה לפני כעשרים שנה על צלע הר גבוה מאד, ירקרק ויפהפה, עם נוף מרהיב עד לים התיכון. הישוב שומר שבת וכך גם המתארחים בו. בית הכנסת המרכזי במרחק חמש דקות הליכה.
summary: מקום חלומי. מקסים בשביל משפחה, רומנטי לזוגות.  נופים מרהיבים מכל חלון, שבילים עטורים בעצי פרי ונוי, ומעיינות במרחק עשר דק' הליכה.

name: 2 bedrooms appartment
summary: A 2 bedroom apartment with a kitchen and balcony and privet garden. The apartment has a private entrance. It is few minutes walk from a supermarket [open 7-22]. It is located in a large religious Jewish community, close to shull. Bus stop a minute walk away. There is no public transport on Saturday.
transit: Buses numb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) to Jerusalem goes approximately every half an hour.

name: Lior Home with a View
summary: Nice homey place to stay half way between Jerusalem and Beer Sheva.  Close to all the tourist places of Biblical Hevron and the Cave of Patriarchs.

name: Incense of Shilo. Calm the soul.
space: Pleasant bedroom with fun family. Very quiet neighborhood, with regular bus service to Jerusalem or in other directions.  This is Shilo. Walk to site of ancient Tabernacle. Tours are available, either from me or other guides, in a variety of languages, or you can just go spend time there alone.   Neighborhood grocery store, green grocer, pizza. Pool open during the summer.  House has WiFi. Community with spirit. With a neighbor we make our own unique wine from Shilo grapes. One of the few wines you can find that adds NOTHING to the grape. Not sulfides, not yeast for fermentation, not wood for flavor. Pure wine. Has won some international prizes.  We are 800 meters above sea level, with beautiful mountain view. Quiet and relaxation. If there is anything we can do to make your stay enjoyable, please ask. Can tell you much about this interesting country, at a very interesting stage of its development.   Chaia parle aussi le français.

name: Located in a quiet, religious town.
space: We have two cabins, one for a couple and the second one is for a family.  The couple cabin has an upstairs loft with a bed and air conditioning.  Downstairs is the kitchen and living room with the bathroom and jacuzzi.    There is also a television and air conditioning.   The family cabin, has a master bedroom with a bathroom, television and air conditioning.  Upstairs in the loft, there are 10 mattresses for the children,  air conditioning and a television for CD's only.   Our cabins are located in a religious community.  There are all the facilities for a religious family to enjoy holidays in Israel.  The pool is open separate in the summer for men and women.    צימרים יפהפים לנוף פסטורלי באווירה כפרית ושקטה בישוב הדתי דלב. בישוב בית כנסת,חוות סוסים ואטרקציות נוספות. הצימרים צמודים לבריכת שחייה הפעילה באביב ובקיץ בשעות נפרדות לנשים וגברים. מתאים למשפחות ולזוגות
summary: We have two wooden cabins, located in a religious, quiet community.  Dolev is located near the city Moddin, which is a half an hour from Jerusalem and Tel-Aviv.  Both cabins are fully equipped with all the kitchen appliances for a religious family.
transit: There is public transportation to Dolev.  At the cabins there is plenty of parking space for your cars. הצימרים בישוב דלב, קרוב לעיר מודיעין במעוצה אזורית מטה בנימין

name: Cosy & quiet2BD with private garden
summary: 2 bedroom apartment with all amenaties , in the heart of a quiet and elegant community. 25 min drive to Jerusalem and close to all attractions of gush etzion. Bus stop right up stairs. Just bring your bags and it's ready for you !

name: Efrat on Haktoret
space: Beautiful new basement apartment, includes:  3 bedrooms  1.5 bathrooms Toaster Oven Hot plate (Shabbat plata) Microwave Stovetop Air conditioning/heating Wi-fi
summary: Beautiful newly renovated basement apartment. Located in the Zayit neighborhood on Haktoret Street. (Next to Narissa's)  Great for families with a fully furnished kitchen perfect for long visits or just a Shabbat
transit: There is parking across the street from the apartment and buses up the block

name: Efrat Bed and Breakfast
space: Homey, warm and clean 3 room Bed and Breakfast with all the amenities, TV, VCR, DVD, movies, music, coffee/tea/snacks/fruit basket corner, fridge, etc.
summary: Visiting Israel on a Budget? Efrat BED & BREAKFAST An affordable Place to stay  In a residential suburb of Jerusalem  3 furnished rooms, accomodates 6  AC/Heating * Refrigerator * Coffee/Tea Corner * Garden  (Email hidden by Airbnb)
transit: Available also: tour of the area, Gush Etzion, Jerusalem

name: Efrat Bed and Breakfast, comfortable and cozy
space: A full floor on top of our home. which has a living room, 2 bedrooms and bathroom and breakfast is being served in the dinning room on the entrance level.
summary: Comfortable family den, wood ceiling, well heated in the winter and airconditioned in the summer, wifi, TV, DVD, movies, delicious home made breakfast, Coffee/tea corner with refreshments, snacks, fruit basket.
transit: Efrat B&B is across the street from the bus to and from Jerusalem, and a block away from the local synagogues

name: Beverly's Cottage
space: I offer a unique personal touch, such as organic cotton sheets, option of vegan or vegetarian breakfast.  Local produce used, including self grown fruit and herbs in season.
summary: I am offering a detached cottage in our beautiful garden located in a gated community in the Biblical Judean Hills, a mere 20 minute drive from Jerusalem.  We are a traditional Jewish Family. People from all backgrounds are welcome in our home. I am a gourmet caterer. We offer a traditional Israeli breakfast free of charge. You are welcome to order a dinner or pre-packed lunch.    We will gladly provide  information and tips on the many attractions in the area.

name: The Rock in Eli
space: The place is very pampering and invested to the smallest details. The place is suitable for sleeping and staying for a joint stay and has creative kits to strengthen the connection between the guests. Meals can be ordered at an additional cost
summary: ״The Rock" This is a pampering B & B in Eli, in Binyamin.   Staying in our apartment  can give you an experience of inspiration, love and creativity.  With your spouse or as a family or friend, awaits you in a quality time of play, film or fun work from a variety of creative estimates we have to offer.

name: Private cozy unit
summary: Newly-built vacation apartment with a private courtyard and a stair-free entrance. Features a full bathroom, equipped kitchen, bedroom with two beds and an open-up couch in the living room and washing machine. Walking distance to the pool, synagogue

name: Adam - Geva Binyamin - Village 3 km from Jerusalem
space: Very close to Jerusalem  (3 km), perfect transportation (bus to the Jerusalem center each 30-20 min)
summary: 3 bedrooms on 2 levels (floors).
transit: Public transportation is 50 meters from home, the bus is every 20-30 minutes depending on times of the day.

name: Jerusalem Mountains Apartment
space: The apartment is fully renovated, about 50 square meter, a leaving room with kitchen and toilet in the first floor, and a second floor gallery with bathroom and toilet. The access to the apartment is by stairs.
summary: The apartment is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). It has a great location, very close to Kibbutz Maale Hachamisha and Kibbutz Kiryat Anavim, near a resort of great restaurants and cafe). Har Adar located in a perfect location to explore Israel, just 5 min drive to Tel Aviv-Jerusalem highway. (Road no.1) A lot of free parking in the streets beside the apartment.
transit: The apartment is just 40 meter from bus station to Jerusalem that arrive every hour (in day time).

name: Tami & Adam's place  in Jerusalem mountains
space: The apartment in the most peaceful environment.  (It's in the Israeli area,  NOT the Palestinian authority ). Free unlimited parking on the street right in front of the apartment. The unit is located 30 minutes from Old City (Jerusalem)  and 40 minutes from Ben Gurion Airport. There is also a bus stop  (no. 187 - to the Jerusalem central bus station)  steps away from the apartment. Recommended to rent your own car!
summary: Located in a small,  quiet suburban neighborhood of Jerusalem,  on a hill overlooking the coast of Israel.   The unit is a two-room apartment just below our beautiful house,  located on the ground floor.  There are two big bedrooms,  a fully functional kitchen,  cozy living room  and dining area, library, study  hall,  patio, and one giant Shower!!!  and of course, Israeli hospitality.
transit: Bus No. 187 from Platform 2 in the Central Bus Station in Jerusalem to Har Adar. The bus stops by the house and asks the driver to tell you when to get off.

name: Boutique apartment in the mountains near Jerusalem
space: The apartment has 3 bedrooms. It is in the first floor of our house. There is a private entrance for guests, and total privacy inside the apartment.      It comes fully furnished with everything you’ll need for a comfortable and worry-free stay - 2 double beds,1 double sofa bed, clean and comfy linens and towels provided, shower cabin and washing machine. Equipped kitchen including refrigerator, oven, microwave, and electric stove. Cable TV and free Wi-Fi.
summary: Come and be among the first to enjoy a brand new apartment in the pastoral hill station of Har Adar. This cozy apartment was designed with lots of love, to make you feel the warmth as if it is your own home. It is located on the tallest mountain between Jerusalem and the sea, in one of the most beautiful areas of Israel. Open concept with lots of natural light and view points. This is a prime location, only 25 minutes from Jerusalem, 20 minutes From Hasada Hospital, and 40 minutes from Tel Aviv.
transit: There is a bus stop to Jerusalem next to our house. We highly recommend to rent a car during your stay so you can travel freely and see some nice places around this beautiful area.

name: In the mountains, near Jerusalem
space: This is the perfect house for a family with kids. it contains private parking, 5 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, 3 balconies with nice view  and private garden. The kitchen is beautiful and equipped.
summary: Pastoral and beautiful private  house in the mountains. Only 20 minutes from Jerusalem and 40 minutes from Tel Aviv. Quiet , lovely and relaxing place.

name: OUR AMAZING POOL APARTMENT IN HAR ADAR
space: the open plan kitchen and living room is clean simple and modern, with all new storage, oven and hot plate for cooking.  we have supplied new cutlery and kitchenware enough to host a nice dinner.  the small shower and bathroom suite is supplied with generous amounts of hot water.   there are two bedrooms, the master has a king size bed, while the second bedroom has two smaller single beds, there are ample storage and modern airconditioning throughout the apartment.  The lower garden is shady secluded and pleasant to relax in, while at night as the sun sets the upper deck makes for a great view of the sunset over the plains to the west.  sorry NO smoking is permitted anywhere on the property, we do not allow pets.
summary: Our amazing apartment is available for long or short term rent to the right person.   our small heated pool and jacuzzi, plus a 6 person sauna, are available to our guests, giving the apartment a spa-like holiday retreat.
transit: we recommend a hire car. there is one bus per hour direct to the city center.

name: A House on the Mountain
space: Our house is God-given, and we are always open for new experiences with any kind of people, who respect our vision.There is one dedicated room for guests and our attic is divided into 3 rooms, that can be arranged and used according to the choice of the guests. Every hosting is organized according to the character of the guests.
summary: Our house is located on Mt. Gerizim in the heart of Samaria and is great for people who wants to live simple , and like to explore the region of Samaria. We offer guidance and tips for travelling throughout the whole region of Samaria. The house is right for travelers, who look for a simple place, couples or individual travelers.

name: Iris's
space: Very quite and relaxing, with garden, flowers and birds. Sauna and Jacuzzi are great after long busy day. We can provide kosher meals, talk to us privately about  it, if you are interested.  WiFi, computer with internet.  Kitchen with all the facilities, cooking stove, microwave, refrigerator, coffee, tea.
summary: Very quiet and private home with large garden,  located right in the middle between Jerusalem and Tel-Aviv, 10 minutes drive from Airport. Contains Kitchen, separate bedroom, Jacuzzi. Perfect for Observant Jews, Located in a prestigious Orthodox Jewish community.  Everyone is welcome, including four-legged guests.  Prices are flexible, big discounts for longer stays. Possibility for airport pick up as well.

name: Hashmonaim Short/Long Term Rental Apartment.
space: Quiet relaxing well located 100 sqm (1000 sqf) apartment with lots of storage and all furniture including two reclining leather couches.
summary: Fantastic location two minute walk from Glenwood, the largest shul in the area and less than 4 minutes to the trampiada! The community is a Jewish religious (dati/frum) community. No private cars are allowed on Shabbat. We are a 5 minute drive to Modiin and Modiin Illit, both cities with almost 100,000 people each and all the big city amenities.
transit: Great public transportation to Jerusalem and close to Modiin and the train station in Modiin. Taxi company typically has cars available within 5-10 minutes of your phone call.

name: Boutique House in center of Israel
summary: My place is good for families (with kids).

name: Itamar Home with a View
space: The place is good for groups up to 9 people, who love a simple style and love plants and art. travelers who play music will find the place very attractive since the host loves art and music.
summary: This place Giv'at Janoah is located in the hills of Itamar in the heart of the Samaria region. It is a place directly in the nature and is meant to host travelers who wants to have a direct touch with the nature. It is good for individuals and for families with this spirit. The place is simple. One room has 4 beds and another place is a tent that we cal wigwam, with a place for 5 people.

name: Garden suite - Dead Sea - kibbutz kalia
space: 5 min drive from the best attractions, the Qumran caves, dead-sea kalia beach, Jericho and Qasr el yahud. also very close to the area Ein-Gedi (Nahal David, Nahal Arugot), Mesada and Jerusalem.
summary: A sweet and cozy brand new suite with a beautiful view of the dead sea.  a large space with a private kitchen with all the accessories, private bathroom and shower and a garden "themed" balcony. nice and quite area with supermarket and lots of parking available. meals are not  included  paid food can be ordered.
transit: Public transportation Line 486 to Jerusalem, Masada, and Ein Bokek

name: 5 min. drive from the Dead Sea
space: About the Location:  - 8 min. drive to the Dead Sea beaches (Kalya, Biankini and more beaches) - 15 min. drive to the mineral mud beaches - 40 min. drive to Messada, the archaeological table mountain site. - 10 min. to the the streams and more national parks. - 5 min. drive to the first restaurant at the area.   About your Private Floor:  - 2nd floor - 2 big bedrooms with double bed each - One private bathroom - Huge balcony with seating area and great view to the Dead Sea - T.V - Wireless internet.  - Small seating area with coffee and tea and cookies  About the rest of the House:  I'll live on the 1st floor and you are more than welcome to share the kitchen with me, for storage, cooking, dinning and more. You are also welcome to use the garden with the hammock and the swing.    About me:   I'm Gila, and I live in the Kibbutz for 13 years, I'm 55 years old, divorced, and my boys are already out of the house. I work in Jerusalem at the Hi-Tec industry, sing at a choir, crafting jewellers and sculptures and working at the garden. Would love to help you around and suggest activities, and of course, to host you here at the Dead Sea.  Looking forward!
summary: A separate floor of 2 bedrooms, private bathroom and a huge balcony facing the Dead Sea. Here are some more details:

name: Atalia & Micha Peleg
summary: We are a couple, both are artists. We live in Kibbutz Kalia, near the Dead Sea. We offer hospitality at our home in our guest room. The room has a Separate entrance, exit to the garden and is suitable for 1-2 people. The room includes: kitchenette, shower and toilet, double bed, closet with sheets and towels, refrigerator, cable TV, electric kettle.  For a little extra you can get meals and work with us and create in our studio. We will be happy to host and meet people from around the world.

name: Sheri's guest room
space: All the comforts of home (plenty of hot water ) Plenty of closet space
summary: 2 rooms with a/c (room for 4 people) with a private entrance (front and back doors) kitchenette ,washing machine in the backyard Internet access Plenty of toys available for children Close to the bus line (to Kfar Saba, Ranana. Petach Tiqva) not far from the local mall where bus to Jerusalem is available) Nearby local grocery store open from 6:30 a.m. Parking in front of the house
transit: There is bus service and plenty of parking right outside the house

name: A place in Neve Aliza
summary: Two rooms in a house of five rooms. A shared bathroom with a tub and shower.
transit: Close to the Young Israel of Neve Aliza

name: apartment with spectacular view
summary: Third floor apartment with an spectacular view of the Shomron mountains, quiet location, opposite the apartment A bus stop to Kfar Sava, Tel Aviv and Jerusalem. Close to the apartment there are three parks and parking.

name: Juda desert apartment
summary: Beautiful apartment, located 15 minutes from Jerusalem city and 15 minutes from the amazing Dead Sea. surrounded by the Juda dessert mountains.

name: Tal in Kfar Adumim West
space: Welcome to the accommodations Tal Ba`midbar at Kfar Adumim. Detailed below is the primary information regarding the site and the variety of services and facilities it offers. A more detailed and full account will be uploaded soon.  At the site there are accomodations (Zimmers) as follows: Accommodations suitable for families and/or groups Rooms for couples and families Additions: Pets are not allowed A Shabbat observing tent - no fire is lit on a Sabbath Non-Smoking Rooms Facilities are suitable for religious guests Services and amenities in your room: Wired or wireless Internet access Air conditioning available Bedroom plus living room Sabbath clock Kitchen Free hot drinks - coffee, tea, milk, sugar A completely accessorized kitchenette Fridge & Freezer Microwave Stove Electric stove Oven Crockery & Utensils Kettle Bathroom Bath Attached bathroom Towels Living room Plasma/LCD screen television Luxuries Body Massage Facilities Garden furniture Outdoor grills A park and lawns Private parking Methods of payment Cash only Check In place and surrounding area Synagogue Free entrance to the Kibbutz/settlement pool Minimarket Mikvah Sports facilities (football, basketball…) Playgrounds for children ADDITIONAL INFORMATION We speak English

name: Cozy room with view at Jordan valey
summary: Quiet and fully furnished room in private house with separate entrance, adjacent yard and individual (Website hidden by Airbnb) bus station to Jerusalim is 3 min by foot and only 10 miles to Jerusalem border and within 15 miles to The Dead Sea. The owner speaks English, Russian, French

name: Jerusalem-Judean Desert Lookout - Kfar Adumim
space: Luxury home.heated pool&WATSU treatments.spectacular desert view. Kfar Adumim is a small village on top of a mountain overlooking Jerusalem and the Dead sea. The village of Kfar Adumim sits on a cliff overlooking the Wadi Kelt (Prat Canyon). Read (EMAIL HIDDEN)

name: Hosting Nowhere 1
summary: Quiet location, only 15 minutes drive from Jerusalem, amazing view to the Judean Desert and the Dead Sea, private rooms,A place to enjoy the quiet.  Large Bungalow (up to 10 people): 1575 NIS per week, 6750 NIS per month. The price includes free use of water, electricity and gas (in the kitchen) and satellite TV

name: NEHARA IN THE DESERT
space: Inside, is an alcove with a queen-size bed, adjacent to a Jacuzzi for two and a large washroom with a luxuriousshower. There is also a kitchenette equipped with a Nespresso coffee machine, refrigerator, and a single electric burner. There is a dining area, a family living room with a comfortable sofa which opens to accommodatethree children, a television with an LCD screen and YES cable, free wi-fi, and an air conditioning unit. Airy and light, with a lounge facing the garden and the view, there is access to a large patio and outdoor area
summary: Welcome to Nehara Bamidbar (Nehara in the Desert) Located on the edge of the desert, with a breathtaking panoramic view, is our suite. Offering tranquility and relaxation and an escape from daily tumult, visitors come to take a deep breath and unwind. The simple, soft contours of the desert horizon are mirrored in the design of the suite and its grounds. 15 minutes from Jerusalem, off the main road descending to the Dead Sea, the suite is spacious and stylish.

name: A family villa in Kfar Adumim
summary: A pleasant country house, fifteen minutes from Jerusalem, half an hour from the Dead Sea and Ein Gedi. Large yard with view, grass and trees. The house has a large public space, three bedrooms in the main house and another bedroom with a bathroom and a separate entrance. Suitable for families with children. The settlement has a supermarket and restaurants and a swimming pool. 5 minutes drive from the water-filled Ein Prat reserve and ten minutes drive from the Wadi Kelt monasteries.

name: Western Landscape flat
space: Stunning view
summary: Unit with stunning views, shading curtain, two beds, a toilet and shower, kitchenette, wardrobe, air conditioning, Wi-Fi, satellite TV
transit: 215 bus from Jerusalem

name: An amazing family home in Kfar Adumim
summary: Summary Fifteen to twenty minutes by car to JERUSALEM!  three minutes by car from the center of Kfar Adumin. The house is a large (230 mr.) with 1000mr.  garden around the house. Fully furnished. bath/shower with  double bedroom upstairs,   2 bath/shower +3 double bedroom downstairs, double sofa bed in lounge,  Lounge/dining room, modern kitchen, Gallery and more... parking at door etc..

name: An AWESOME house between Jerusalem & the Dead sea
summary: The house is located in a small village, viewing the beautiful Judean Desert, the Dead Sea and Jerusalem. The house is 15 mins drive from Jerusalem and 15 mins drive to the dead sea. The location is phenomenal!  Love hiking? walk to the water stream in the valley, or drive to Ein Zukim spring or to Ein Gedi. If you would like to visit Christian sites: The Good Samaritan, Qasr el Yahud and churches in Jerusalem or Jewish sites: The Western Wall, The old city, the Israel Museum and so much more.

name: Desert Camping Israel -  Shepherd's Tent Dorm
space: Book a mattress in our original nomads' tent dormitory. Experience the Judean Desert first-hand. The large tent is comfortably set up for 20 single mattress, clean linen included, spread out on large mats and carpets. As an ecological campsite, we offer eco-friendly restrooms and showers. אוהל הרועים  אוהל נוודי המדבר מתאים ללינה משותפת ל - 20  אורחים ניתן לשכור מזרון בודד במתחם ללינה עם אורחים נוספים או לשכור את האוהל כולו ללינה קבוצתית
summary: Experience the tranquility of the desert and get a taste of warm Israeli hospitality. Desert Camping Israel is a family run ecological campsite located in the heart of the Judean Wilderness. ​Our tent villages allow for our guests to intimately experience the wonders of the Desert.  Accommodations include options for single travelers,  couples, families and large groups.

name: Vacation on Mount Kida 2
space: The published price is for a pair
summary: My place is close to art and culture, Winery, Ancient Shilo, Samaria, Jorden vally. You’ll love my place because of the outdoors space, the view, maintaining cleanliness, the pacific around. My place is good for couples and families (with kids).
transit: near Jerusalem, Samaria, Binyamin and Jordan Vally communities.

name: Beit Driben
space: Beit Driben started as a factory and farm in the (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) s by Eddie Dribben (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) may he rest in peace. Eddie was a cowboy who came to Israel from Wyoming after serving in the US Military and lived in Israel ever since. His widow Sara Haya continues to live there. She is an artist who has designed and decorated this marvelous estate.  We have hosted many events in our indoor halls and outdoor areas.  People from all walks of life and backgrounds are welcome. We have an indoor pool that works all year round.  We look forward to hosting you!
summary: Beit Driben is a beautifully decorated highly versatile 5 story complex with many apartments, rooms, halls & both public & private sitting areas. We are located in the industrial area of Kiryat Arba/Hevron. We are 1 hr from Jerusalem, 1/2 an hr from Bethlaham and 1 hr from Be'er Sheva. We are minutes away from the Cave of the Patriarchs where the patriarchs and matriarchs are burried. There are regular busses to and from Jerusalem & Be'er Sheva.

name: A charming and big house
summary: religious community, 25 minutes' drive from Jerusalem. With huge private parking. 2 baths. 4 air conditioners. Huge yard. Minute walk from the grocery store, synagogue, etc. Community is located in Stunning mountain views and air land of Israel.

name: Netanel
summary: 4 bedrooms Children's playroom A huge garden with a barbecue Services big kitchen

name: location villa  10 min de jerusalem/mer morte
summary: villa tout confort sur 3 etage situee a 10 min de jerusalem et 20 de la mer morte, grandes chambres, clim, internet wifi home cinema 2 salles de bains 3 wc lave vaissele lave/seche linge parking prive barbecue quartier residentiel a la sem ou au mois

name: Appartment with garden @dati family
space: There is a room with a real bed, closet, table, and chair. Heating and cooling available in the room
summary: Perfect place to stay when visiting friends, or family, or if you want to stay in a quite neighbourhood close to Jerusalem. You can stay here over shabat and join us in the se'udah (we keep kosher). Nice garden to enjoy the beautiful scenery
transit: There is a bus stop next to our door with buses practically going everywhere you need to go.

name: Hagilgal Hills
space: Private entrance
summary: A nice studio, hotel like, in Maale Adumim Mitzpe Nevo (religious neighborhood). Located between Jerusalem and the Dead Sea.   Includes all facilities: Kitchenette, furniture,  blankets,sheets, towels, air conditioner, fridge, m

name: Desert Pearl
summary: My place is close to public transport. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). great location between Jerusalem (15 mins) and The Dead Sea (30 mins). Double roofed parking.

name: The Biblical Loge
space: The privecy for a couple , larg deck , beautifull garden made of fruit trees and siting positions towards the view , pools and waterfalls .
summary: My place is close to art and culture, great views, and family-friendly activities. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood, the outdoors space, the comfy bed, and the light. My place is good for couples.
transit: Maps , waze , instruction .

name: Moshav Matityahu
summary: BS"D  The house is located in a beautiful and  nice community and place!  Moshav Matityahu is an american and religious Shomer Shaboss and Tzniut place and community. The Kitchen is a Kosher Kitchen. The house is a 5 minutes walk from the Shul and a 5 minute walk from a beautiful community pool with separate hours for men and women (Separate fee).  Matityahu is a 40 minute bus ride to Jerusalem.

name: Country Little House
space: It's a new unit in a quiet village looking to the hills of Judea, the place is in a countryside atmosphere.
summary: Our home is in a religious* village in the Ayalon Valley, with view to the beautiful Canada park, suitable for hiking or biking.  It is located in the middle between Tel Aviv and Jerusalem (5 minutes from highway 1, 20 minutes from TLV international airport).  *Cars cannot enter on Saturday

name: A small house. Perfect for a couple.
summary: Our house is located in Gush Etzion. A path where history and future meet. There are many attractions here especially around the holidays. We are 15 minutes from Jerusalem. Our house is cozy.  And it has all you need for your stay. We keep "kosher" (so kitchen can only be used by observant or orthodox Jews who also are kosher.) We can help you organize your trip. Many in the area know English and will gladly help you travel around (hitchhiking)

name: Between mountains and sea - Dead-Sea
summary: Shalom! Our house is located in one of the most beautiful places in the world. We are a family with 3 kids and a dog, living in a big private house with an amazing view to the Dead-Sea and to the desert mountains. We love to host and get to know people from all over the world. In the Kibbuts we have a small market shop and a local Pub. We live very close to Ein Gedi nature reserve (10 minutes driving), to Kedem hot springs, Massada National Park, and only an hour drive from Jerusalem.

name: Individual and hospitable! 1
space: I have a large house. The kids have almost left home.  Sometimes, they  come for a visit, so I cannot always rent out my rooms to guests . Therefore, you have to make a request to book.
summary: I offer peace u. Beauty of nature in the Judean Desert, overlooking the sunset over their mountains to Jerusalem. Easily accessible by bus u. Tramp, on the way Jerusalem-Dead Sea. Supermarket yet. I also speak German.
transit: Es gibt ein Bus 216 von Jerusalem (Binjanei Ha Umma) bis direkt nach Mitzpe Jericho. Von hier gibt es Busse zum Toten Meer , nach Tiberias-See Genezareth und sogar nach Elat. Am Schabbat ruhen dir öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel. Man kann an der großen Hauptstraße arabische Taxis stoppen. . Wer mit einem Mietwagen kommt kann direkt vors Haus fahren, natürlich umsonst. Es ist bei dem Mieten eines Wagens zu empfehlen, solch eine Leihfirma zu wählen, die die Benutzung der B-Gebiete  (Westjordanland unter israelischer Militärbewachung) erlauben. (es kam vor, daß deshalb ein Gast absagte, der den Wagen von Deutschland aus mietete)

name: Desert Song Getaway
space: A romantic getaway excursion waits for you in the Holy Land, 15 minutes to Jerusalem, 15 minutes to the Dead Sea. We invest in the tiny details of comfort, design, and style to make your stay with us completely enjoyable and relaxing.
summary: Beautifully decorated and spacious apartment, with a breathtaking view of the mountains. Includes Jacuzzi, two showers, espresso machine, ample kitchen (kosher), sitting room, a quiet porch for the view, free wi-fi, cable TV and a romantic bedroom.
transit: Public Transportation options include buses every two hours, to Jerusalem, the Dead Sea, and the North. Private taxi service is also available, but it is easiest to travel in this area with a private car.

name: ♥ Clean, Comfy, Convenient Suite ♥
summary: Brand new, clean and comfortable suite in Modiin Illit ("Kiryat Sefer") with a small kitchen area (counter, sink, cabinets, fridge - no stove or oven) and a seating area. There is plenty of closet space and a bathroom with a shower. All linens (sheets, pillow cases, towels) are super clean and really comfy. It has a private entrance and is situated in a very quiet, private location, not facing the street. We are really friendly, American hosts and we're happy to answer any questions you have!
transit: There is plenty of free parking in the area, and busses all day to Jerusalem, Bnei Brak, Beit Shemesh, and Modiin.

name: Neve Daniel Tzimmer
space: Vacation Suite in Neve Daniel Quiet time away, fresh air, remarkable views across Israel from almost 1000 feet above sea level. 2-rooms, newly renovated. Ground floor and 30 seconds walk to local synagogue. Separate entrance + private, sunny outdoor area. Fully equipped - linen, towels, pillows, blankets, heaters etc provided.  Kitchen including fridge, Shabbat kettle, chalavi (milky) plates, pots, appliances etc Clothes washing machine and dryer. WIFI. Complimentary cleaner for one hour, once per every week booked.
summary: Enjoy the quiet, the panoramic views & fresh air 1000 meters above sea level. Perfect for a couple looking for peaceful time away or visiting for smachot, chagim in this clean, friendly Modern Orthodox community 15 minutes from Jerusalem. Your suite: 2 rooms, nicely renovated, fully equipped, new beds,  WIFI, outdoor area, ground floor, footsteps from synagogue. Stunning pool (at extra cost) 1 minute walk from the suite - must be booked in advance for private swimming slot.
transit: Best to bring your own car though travel on Egged bus from Jerusalem very simple

name: Quite place in center of country
summary: Our quiet, bright apartment is situated in the center of the country between Jerusalem and Tel Aviv (8 km north from Modiin).  We are located on the first hills on the way to Jerusalem and have a magnificent view of the sea and many old olive trees.

name: Country house, just 15 minutes from Jerusalem
summary: Our place is close to family-friendly activities. You’ll love my place because of the outdoors space,  the ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), big groups, and furry friends (pets).
transit: Parking is available next to our place. A bus station is 2 min walk - transportation to Jerusalem is about every single hour.

name: Eastern Landscape room
summary: Stunning view

name: Desert View Apartment
space: Rooms for couples and families Services and amenities in your room: Living room Dining room Kitchen A kitchenette for light meals Fridge & Freezer Microwave Stove
summary: Desert View offers a private balcony with mountain (Website hidden by Airbnb) features air conditioning, free parking and free WiFi.It has a modern décor, a satellite flat-screen TV . It is composed of a separate bedroom, a living room with fully equipped kitchenette.
transit: Nofey Prat is located within the Scenic desert landscapes of the Judean Desert.  Below Nofey Prat you can find the flowing springs of the Prat River. The unique location of the Desert landscapes opens up spectacular views of ancient views, the northern ridge of Jerusalem, the Prat River and the Dead Sea landscape, all of which creates a pleasant feeling of eternal freedom.  Its location, between the Dead Sea and Jerusalem, allows access for many touristic sites and nature reserves.

name: If you like rustic, you'll love it.
summary: I joke that the accommodations are "5-star" ...  minus 5-stars :-).  Although rustic, it's comfortable. The bungalow might be worth a dime, but the view (of the Judean Wilderness) is worth a million dollars. Yet, it's just a 7-minute drive into Jerusalem!
transit: There are public buses into and back from Jerusalem every couple/few hours.

name: Studio
summary: Un charmant petit studio avec kichnette salle de douche WC  terrasse privé dans petit village calme bien pour un couple ,possibilité d avoir une chambre supplémentaire avec supplément a 25 kms. De Jérusalem...

name: Chambre spacieuse,  45 mn de Jérusalem (OFRA)
space: La chambre est claire  et a l étage . 2 placards de rangement Un enfant jusqu a 3 ans peut aussi dormir si besoin salle de bain spacieuse . un bureau dans la chambre pour travailler ou étudier.
summary: 45 mn   de  Jérusalem chambre calme se trouvant dans une maison d un village verdoyant et aéré. ideaL pour repos. 2 lits jumeaux et un lit enfant lit supplémentaire si besoin. chambre spacieuse pour y déposer des affaires.  wifi  café et thé a disposition serviettes et draps fournis Petit déjeuner offert
transit: Notre logement est situe a 30km de Jérusalem. a partir de la station centrale de Jérusalem Notre station de bus est a 5 minutes du logement en voiture et a 20 minutes a pied Un restaurant et une pizzeria se trouve également dans notre village a 5 mn en voiture

name: Nof Ofra
space: A spacious and unique unit tiled with books over special stone walls
summary: With stunning view and the coolest air you can find in the Israeli summer, our vacation rental offers you also a charming and private swimming pool. The unit is spacious and charmong in its authentic and modern style

name: Central Israel, lovely room to rent
space: New, clean, house, great views and a garden.  Room has comfortable bed with memory foam mattress, clothes hanging facilities, ceiling fan, two windows, mosquito nets.  Beautiful, quiet town in the hills.  Located near Road 6 for great access to the north and south of the country.
summary: Guest bedroom in new house, right in the center of Israel. A great touring base, only 20 mins from Tel Aviv beaches, 45 mins from Jerusalem, 1 hour from the Dead Sea. Great access to Rosh HaAyin, Petach Tikva, Hod HaSharon, Ra'anana, Herziliya, Ariel.
transit: Renting a car is advised. Public transport is sparse from the town itself, better from the main junction which is a hitch away (common in the area).

name: cozy appartment fully furnished great location
summary: My place is close to the airport. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

name: Beauty apartment, Breathtaking view
space: 35 min from the big city Tel-Aviv, 10 min from Rosh-Ha'Ayin train station and right ahead of the most beautiful view in the country, at the local council of Oranit.  3 rooms big apartment (96m sqr) with 1 bedroom with large bed + toilets, big bathroom with bath, equiped with washing machine + a dryer, another working room and a real huge space of living room and equiped kitchen (50m sqr).  A real big balcony (15m sqr) with big table for breakfast, lucnh and dinner ahead the most beautiful view of green mountains, fields and olive trees. And at the other side a private garden with wood deck, a lemon tree, place to have a barbecue and chillout (15m sqr).  The apartment is part of a 3 floors small building in a quiet and very friendly neighborhood.   At the living room: 42 inches TV screen, receiver + speakers (for ipad/ipod) At the kitchen: oven, microwave oven and a lot of kitchenware.

name: דירה מהממת בישוב דתי
summary: בית נעים, מואר ויפהפה. מתאים לזוג (עם או בלי ילדים) או לקבוצות חברים קטנות

name: The private studio in Revava
summary: Nice new private room with bathroom. private enterance. Located at Revava, very nice and peaceful village in the Samaria woods. 100m from Revava center, supermarket, pizza, ATM, ect. Ideal for single or couple guests that have business in Samaria area or travellers that looking for special and quite place. Include Kosher kitchen, oven and stove top. refrigider, cofee and tea. closet.

name: Ruth's Home -Boutique guesthouse for couples
summary: Looking for a personalized experience of Israel off the beaten track?  we invite you to stay with us at Ruth's Home!  Ruth's Home is situated in the "Galilee of Jerusalem",  amidst vineyards, orchards and natural springs.  Built with love and furnished with unique handmade wood art,  Ruth's Home offers a space of inspiration and relaxation. At Ruth's Home,  we host couples for overnight stays,  intimate boutique events  unique workshops. Two hour workshop with wood artist

name: Bikta B'Kerem
space: The published price is for a pair
summary: The published price is for a couple. Arrival by private / rented car or Taxi. Breakfast can be ordered at an additional cost.

name: צימר מהמם מול נוף ההרודיון
space: The place is decorated Nice and comfortable
summary: My place is close to great views. You’ll love it because of the kitchen, the comfy bed, the light, the coziness, and the neighborhood. My place is good for couples. We look forward to hosting you.

name: Nice house in Tekoa B
summary: Privacy and amaizing view of the Judian desert and the Herodion

name: 15 min from Jerusalem, inspiring...
summary: 3 rooms + balcony, a grape arbor, an orchard and a sitting area overlooking the spectacular Judea desert landscape.Well equipped, decorated, beautifully & tastefully furnished in authentic oriental style. Situated on a spacious plot that gives privacy , peacefulness and relax. 15 minutes drive from Jerusalem
transit: Buses from Jerusalem to Tekoa several times a day. For buses from Jerusalem Central Bus Station To Tko'a Center, visit:  (website hidden)/search (ATTENTION: in destination field type Tko'a): Of course you can also drive your car from Har Homa (south Jerusalem), 12 min.

name: Herod's View Spacious Villa near Jerusalem
space: A private house consists of 2 floors, 240 sq. meters.  includes: •7 bedrooms, 2 of them has a private bathroom •large kosher kitchen, fully equipped. coffee machine, microwave and oven,  big refrigerator, kettle and all cooking utilities. •dining table for up to 12 people. •large play area for children •linens and towels •private Wifi •air-conditioning •laundry machine and dryer • 2 bathrooms with bath tub, and 2 more toilet rooms •a beautiful yard, porches and balcony with open view to Judean desert and the Herodion hill.
summary: Our house is large and comfortable, tastefully furnished and fits one family or more, children or adults. The area is quiet and welcoming, enjoy full privacy and a beautiful view of the Judean desert and the Herodion. We are located in Tekoa, a unique communal settlement about 20 minutes from Jerusalem.

name: Bejell Home
summary: קרוואן מוגדל (80 מ"ר) מתאים למשפחה גדולה. נוף פנורמי למדבר יהודה. מטבח כשר Large caravan (80 SqM) suitable for a large family, panoramic view of Judean Desert, kosher kitchen

name: king herod
summary: The house is in the town of Tekoa Amazing breeze. 15 min. from Jerusalem. view of  Judaian dessert .  in the towen there is a pool and horse back riding farm, Restaurant .Near by is Herodion a national trail and historical site and a challenging park .
